Articles.Content:
So I have been using my KSP save for a while, but today it suddenly stopped loading at Squad/parts/resources/surveyscanner/surveyscanner/surveyscanner. Now I looked in my files and there is no Squad/parts/resources/surveyscanner/surveyscanner/surveyscanner. It stops at 2 surveyscanners, since the first one is a folder and the last one is a cfg file. I have a picture here:

I'm not sure what it is, but I haven't added any mods recently and/or updated steam or KSP. I don't use CKAN either, so I'm not sure what has gone wrong. If it's another bug, does anyone know how to contact a dev properly about this? Thanks!

Edited February 15, 2016 by batman78781
